    C

    calculateCost(float) - Method in class Generator
    Calculates the cost for given power based on the cost function of the generator

    G

    Generator - Class in Unnamed Package
    Stores details about each generator and calculates its cost for a given output.

    The parameterised constructor for Generator class.

    I

    InputLoader - Class in Unnamed Package
    Utility class for handling user input related to generator parameters.
    InputLoader() - Constructor for class InputLoader
     
    isWithinLimits(float) - Method in class Generator
    Checks if the given power is within the limits of the generator power capacity

    L

    loadFromUser() - Static method in class InputLoader
    Accepts the no.of generators and generator parameters for each one as inputs from the user , creates generator object for each generator, adds all of them into arraylist and returns the arraylist.
